Module kivakit.core.resource

Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.filesystem

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileSystemObject
    Base class for all filesystem objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Disk  
    File
    File abstraction that adds type safety and various helpful methods.
    File.Converter  
    File.Resolver  
    FileCache
    A file cache with the given root.
    FileList
    A list of files with useful methods added.
    FileList.Converter
    Converts to and from FileLists
    Folder
    Folder abstraction that adds type safety and various helpful methods to FileSystemObject.
    Folder.Converter  
    Folder.Resolver  
    FolderChangeWatcher
    Watches for changes to the contents of a Folder.
    FolderList
    A list of folders with additional useful methods, including: FolderList.asSet() - This list as a set FolderList.matching(Matcher) - The folders in this list that match the given matcher
    FolderList.Converter  
    FolderPruner
    Removes nested files matching FolderPruner.matcher(Matcher) from the given folder when they meet expiration criteria.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Folder.Traversal  
    Folder.Type
